subdefinitions.definition: Used as the direct object of a verb.
examples: She treated them for a cold.

subdefinitions.definition: Used as the indirect object of a verb.
Used as the object of a preposition.

definitions.definition: A single person, previously mentioned, whose gender is unknown, irrelevant, or ( since 21st c. ) non-binary .

subdefinitions.definition: Used as the direct object of a verb.
examples: If a student has an inappropriate question, whatever you do, do not berate them .

subdefinitions.definition: Used as the indirect object of a verb.
examples: If one of my patients calls, please bring them their dinner.

subdefinitions.definition: Used as the object of a preposition.
examples: If someone comes and asks for the ticket, just give it to them .
I know it seems unfair, but them ' s the rules.
definitions.label_groups: informal set phrases , dialectal or nonstandard

secondary_definitions: ( in the singular , occasionally proscribed ) A single person, previously mentioned, whose gender is unknown, irrelevant, or ( since 21st c. ) non-binary .
( informal set phrases , dialectal or nonstandard ) They or those.
